solution.linktext: 為何向 Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher 購買？

supportoption.title: Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher 計畫
supportoption.description: 獲得 Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher 計畫資格，有能力向企業、消費者和非營利組織提供預先安裝了正版 Microsoft 軟體的翻新電腦。
supportoption.linkurl: http://www.microsoftpartnersupport.com/create-incident?mpnid=Unavailable&email=oemincentives@microsoft.com&supporttopicid_l1=方案和成員資格&supporttopicid_l2=方案&supporttopicid_l3=Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher (MAR)&locale=en-sa&language=EN" target="_blank
